title: PBE Signup
body: Back in May, I was accepted for a PBE account but could make one, now I'm trying to make an account now and when I click the  button to check my eligibility, it bugs out and says something went wrong refresh the page and try again. so I refresh the page and click it again and get the same message over and over, with the same result.

replies.body: Thank you very much. Issue resolved

Up at the top you can find the [**PBE Signup Sticky**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fAy3y263-pbe-is-backwait-wut) which goes over how that signup page is currently under a ridiculous amount of traffic since it *just* launched. We're still able to process the applications, but due to the sheer amount of players hitting that button all at once, it may not work at first. Give it some time and try a bit later, you'll get through soon enough!
